definitions.body: act of lying, layer;—only cstr. [[שִׁכְבַת]] all P;—
act of lying, as acc. cogn. c. [[שׁכב]]

[[שִׁכְבַת־זׇ֑רַע]] Le 15:18 a man lies with her a lying of seed (in copulation), cf. Le 19:20, Nu 5:13; then ( = semen), [[תֵּחֵא שִׁכְבַת־זׇ֑רַע]] Le 15:16, Le 15:32, Le 22:4 (+ [[מִמֶּנּוּ]]), ´[[ז]] :´[[שׁ]]: alone Le 15:17.
layer of dew, [[שִׁכְבַת הַטָָּל]] Ex 16:13, Ex 16:14 (P).
